name: Night at the Supermarket
description:
Night at the Supermarket was made for the Halloween Jam 2021!

Theme: Ghosts doing Normal People Things

You have to collect all items on your shoppinglist and bring them to the checkout in the shortest amount of time possible.

Controls:

WASD - Move around
Space - Pick up and Drop Items
L - Push or Pull Basket
M - Open Map
Esc - Pause Game

Created by Xanashea and Soelna

Music by Stegoratops

Disclaimer: This version is not supported for mobile devices.
